titleStmt.title: The principles of the Cyprianic age with regard to episcopal power and jurisdiction asserted and recommended from the genuine writings of St. Cyprian himself and his contemporaries : by which it is made evident that the vindicator of the Kirk of Scotland is obligated by his own concession to acknowledge that he and his associates are schismaticks : in a letter to a friend / by J.S.
titleStmt.author: Sage, John, 1652-1711.

notesStmt.note: Written by John Sage. Cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
